comment: This app is great, my main reason for downloading it was to remind me to get up and move when sitting in the office. However it always has its logo in the notification bar and for that reason I can't give it 5 stars. Really annoying to have it there all the time
title: Awesome app but...

author: Kevin R. Kidder
comment: The reminder to move after a certain amount of inactivity is great and the interface is very easy to use.  More than once, though, it has indicated that I hadn't moved for quite a while immediately after doing something that should qualify as moving in my mind, such as going out and playing fetch with the dog, or carrying laundry down and starting a load.  It does catch bigger things, like taking a walk or exercise class, so it makes me wonder what the threshold is.
title: Good Reminder, Algorithm?

author: James Johnston
comment: I like this giving me reminders when I have been sitting around too long at the office, but the actual activity time is not accurate. Many times when commuting to work, I will be on the freeway for a while, hit my exit, and get a congratulations for being active 20 minutes. So, this still does the one thing nothing else in does, and gives me inactivity reminders, and I'll use Google Fit to track my actual steps.

author: Vijay Shankar Venkataraman
comment: I like how the app reminds me when I have been inactive for too long. The activity tracking works for me without any issues. The persistent notification is mildly annoying, as noted by many others.
title: Good app to remind yourself to get up and get movn

author: Kristin H
comment: Great concept but I don't see anywhere to set up when I want it working and when I don't so presumably I need to remember to turn it on and off each day for sleep.  Also my phone's vibrate is really lame so I don't feel it most times.  It needs an option to add sound.  Also agree with everyone else that having the icon at the top all the time is a drag.
title: Needs a few more features

author: Laura Morrison
comment: Great idea, but having used it for a few days I'm not sure about the accuracy. I went for a good 50min walk and it only logged 15 min, my partners logged 40min which is closer but still off. Think it tracks bits of my car journeys too? I like the concept, the design and it's really simple to use but think it needs some work on accuracy.
title: Great idea

author: Grant B
comment: I find it works maybe 70% of the time. When it works, it is really cool. Sometimes, the stand up alarm goes off when I have been standing in the kitchen. But, it is because I have been standing mostly in one place for a while perhaps. If I sit on the couch too long, it works almost every time. It seems to help it, like they say in the directions, try to keep it in your pocket. Overall, they really have something. As far as I know, there is no purely phone based sitting alert app out there.
title: Works mostly

author: Jeffrey Fein
comment: Get rid of the persistent bar alert.  It can pop up, but it should sit there.  I'm considering deleting it for that reason.  Everything else is great.

author: Chris Benkert
comment: It really is a great app. My only gripe is that I cannot get rid of the Status Bar Alert on my Note 4.
title: Great app. Persistent Status Bar Alert Note 4

author: Glenda Mcleod
comment: I was doing my housework and was walking to and fro inside my house but it still counts as sitting.
title: Not so accurate

author: Karstan Lovorn
comment: Requires access to my contact list, as well a creating a login. Neither should be necessary for such a simple app and is honestly kind of creepy.
title: Invasive

author: Rob Joubert
comment: The current day data is good but the previous day's does not get saved.  It used to save eye previous day  - but after I have been using movn for two weeks the previous day's data was reset to zero.
title: It works for the current day

author: Emily Flood Leavitt
comment: Helpful tool to remind me to get up and move. Might be nice to see breakdown of when moved. Interesting that tool sometimes registers movement when driving.
title: Good Simple Tool

author: Umashankar Viswanathan
comment: A handy and useful monitor which regulates my activity effectively spread over the day and in the process cuts down drastically on my inactive state thus enhancing briskness manifold

author: Brad Hansen
comment: I wanted an app that would both track my steps and time spent active (with notifications to be active when I've been sitting too long). This fits that well.
title: Simple & Easy

author: Pamela woodfill
comment: I like that it tells me to get up and move
title: Sitting to much

author: Paul Schneider
comment: I need the reminder - it's the next best thing to remember myself.
title: Does what it's supposed to do

author: Nick Doom
comment: I would like smaller movement reminders, say down to 10 15 minutes.
title: Use it all the time

author: Dan Johnson
comment: Please use Android Wear sensor. I don't always want to carry my phone.
title: Android Wear

author: Mary Vonvital
comment: It's a great, simple app...easy to use and very helpful.

author: David Wallace
comment: Activity app
title: Movn

author: Anshumaan Shankar
comment: Brilliant app. Helps me stay active!

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you for the kind words!

author: Julia Allegrini
comment: Great, simple inactivity timer for desk jockeys

author: Matei Alexandru
comment: Barelly works

author: Christy Ann
comment: Easy way to increase walking

author: Rihards Evele
comment: I like
title: Loved it

author: Clifton Strang
comment: working good for me

author: Adrian Bartholomeusz
comment: Very good

author: Zara Asif
comment: Nice

author: Robert Scism
comment: 1. The permanent notification is unnecessary and distracting. Please remove this feature. 2. The inactivity alert function doesn't always alert me on my Moto 360 watch, even though that option was selected in settings. 3. The app really should be able to pull motion data directly from any android wearable without having to carry around the phone all day. 4. Give up all of my contact info? I gave in to this request because I really wanted an inactivity alarm, but this app has not been worth it. 5. Google Fit started crashing after I installed this app. Not sure if related.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable feedback, we are working on robust Android wear support and ti will show up shortly.

title: Needs work

author: Arun Dwivedi
comment: Still needs a lot of work on the accuracy of using sensors, but otherwise a useful app for people who are engrossed with their desk jobs everyday and don't move around much.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, were there any particular situations where you felt it was not very accurate?

title: Helpful.

author: Chandradeep Mallik
comment: Since the new update the records and the activity profile have stopped showing data. Please fix.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback, we are working on a bug fix and will push one out shortly!

title: Records and Activity Profile not working

author: Tulip Landscape
comment: Ever since the update this week, my daily activity is not being saved by Movn & the 7 day history is also not working!!!

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Hi, we have noticed this bug and found a fix for it. For now, if you quit the app (by pressing the back button) and then restart it, you will get the data back.  Please contact us at info@movinganalytics.com and we will send you a new version.

title: This is weird!!

author: jamthetram
comment: I like the way this works. More than just a pedometer. I've been using for weeks with great results. Also when I clear recent usage it does not affect Movn.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you very much for your support! We look forward to helping you more.

title: Fun to use

author: Scott Aniol
comment: I'd like the option to hide the status bar notification.
title: Hide status bar notification

author: Daphne Adeane
comment: App works!

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: We just pushed an update to our app that fixes this problem and verified it on Samsung S4s. Please let us know if the new update works. The update should be available within 24 hours.

author: Ali Nakhai
comment: Samsung S4
title: Works fine now

author: Jesse Grant
comment: Thus app is fantastic for reminding me to not sit so long. All research is showing scary links to increased heart attack risk to increase in cancer from sitting for extended periods...even for active people!! Great job with app looks and goal setting! I wish I could have the app use a combo of my Android Wear and phone for movement info. When I run on a treadmill I set the phone on the treadmill and my run isn't captured...

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Thank you for your kind words, we really appreciate it! We are working on Android wear support now!

title: Great reminders!

author: Even-André S Andersen
comment: Useless as there is no keyboard visible. S4+ I really wanted this to work.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: We just pushed an update to our app that fixes this problem and verified it on Samsung S4s. Please let us know if the new update works. The update should be available within 24 hours.

title: No keyboard

author: Scott Pedersen
comment: I am enjoying this app. My only gripe is that I wish the activity meter would read my inputs from my smart watch. Rather than always having to have the phone in my pocket.

reply.author: Moving Analytics
reply.content: Hi, that is our most request feature and we will work to add it asap! Thank you for the suggestion.

title: Nice nudge.
